subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Bruce and the 49ers’ offensive coordinator, Mike Martz, will return to St. Louis to face their former team on the field that inspired the nickname for their Super Bowl-winning Rams.
snippet: On Sunday, Bruce and the 49ers’ offensive coordinator, Mike Martz, will return to St. Louis to face their former team on the field that inspired the nickname for their Super Bowl-winning Rams.
